arts.ttl: Samuele Ricci to Man City: Expert explains why £30m January transfer is "sensible" amid Rodri blow
arts.sum: Man City expert Steven McInerney from Esteemed Kompany tells Sports Mole that he can envisage the Citizens signing a £30m midfielder in January if they decide to recruit a replacement for injured star Rodri.

arts.ttl: Preview: Legia Warsaw vs. Real Betis - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Thursday's Europa Conference League clash between Legia Warsaw and Real Betis, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Real Betis to be without star performer for Conference League opener
arts.sum: Giovani Lo Celso has had a phenomenal start to life back at Real Betis. In five appearances (four starts) since returning to the club from Tottenham Hotspur, he has racked up five goals – this included the winner against Espanyol on Sunday.
